name: MARS RANGER
description:
MARS RANGER is a top-down, arena style shooter. Kill aliens and collect their eggs, survive as long as possible to get the highest score!

Key Features:
  • Reload System
  • Score system
  • Highscore saving system
  • Wave mechanics
  • Pickups
Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Look around
  • Left-click - Fire
  • R - Reload
